alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 7:42PM EDT until April 22 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Otsego County in central New York... North central Delaware County in central New York... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 742 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Meredith, or 7 miles east of Oneonta, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Davenport, Worcester, Middlefield, Maryland, Cooperstown, Westville, Springfield, Westford and Cherry Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
